name: Hacker Tracker
description:
A Retro New Wave styled and inspired game where you defend and survive from invading cyber-blips!

This small arcade styled screen defense game is all about trying to get the highest score possible! I wish you luck, you absolutely glorious commander with a swift finger I believe you'll be able to survive longer than the previous commander... Well at least a little longer. That's a start, right?

Current submitted high score:
#1: 147
#2: 136
#3: ????

Hi~Hi~ Developer Kats here just to say. 
(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:・ﾟ Thank you for checking out Hacker Tracker. (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:・ﾟ
I've been a little dazed when making games for a little while and struggled to complete projects, so while this one is incredibly small (It took me like, 20 hours? Roughly?) I'm going to be creating a lot more throughout the year when I can! _/＼○_
